altername_name: Score International Baja 1000: World Championship Offroad Racing
name: SCORE International Baja 1000
overview: Drive the most powerful off-road vehicles in this hair-raising quest for sand supremacy! Experience danger in wheel-to-wheel racing action over some of the wildest and most treacherous terrain the Baja has to offer, with the most insane crashes ever assembled in one game… strap yourself in, this isn’t your grandpa’s racing game! True Baja Desert Racing! * Inspired by real Baja Peninsula locations. * Aggressive wheel-to-wheel circuit racing: each race is a stage allowing the player to progress further down the Baja Peninsula. Authentic Vehicles, Damage, and Wear! * There are 90 vehicles in 6 official SCORE vehicle classes, including Trophy Trucks, ATV’s, and dirt bikes. * All vehicles are susceptible to wear and will lose parts and get dirty, scratched, etc. Realistic Physics-Infused Surfaces! * Race across dirt, sand, mud, asphalt, and more… all of which react realistically to tires and affect handling. 3 Game Modes! * Career: 5 event types in career mode, including time trial and head-to-head qualifiers, single/multi-class circuits, and endurance regional races. * Exhibition: Quick play in which player chooses favorite vehicle, track, and event to race. * Online: 8 players connect online and choose to participate in either ranked or unranked events.
